    public class LegacyAlgorithmShadedColorScheme
extends LegacyAlternativeAlgorithmColorScheme
    attempt to provide broadest spectrum of color range to provide contrast. playing with adjustment to saturation and brilliance based on higher angle counts seen in hue
    Author:
    Michael Druckman
